name: LogicMonitor Dashboards
description: Auto-Dashboards included with the provisioning of every new LogicMonitor account.

config.name: Top VMware VMs by Available Memory %
Top VMware VMs by CPU Utilization %
Dashboard Summary
config.content:
Welcome to the VMware Overview Dashboard!

Overview dashboards provide quick and easy access to high-level metrics that facilitate rapid issue identification and resolution. As you add VMware devices, this dashboard will auto-populate with vital statistics about their health and activity.

dashboards.name: Collector Summary
dashboards.description: Status and critical metrics of your LogicMonitor Collectors.

config.name: Dashboard Summary
config.content:
Welcome to the Collector Summary Dashboard!

As you add Collectors to your LogicMonitor account - and monitor the devices on which they're installed - this dashboard will provide vital statistics about Collector activity and the composition of your monitoring environment.

config.name: Dashboard Summary
config.content:
Welcome to the Alerts Overview Dashboard!

Overview dashboards provide quick and easy access to high-level metrics that facilitate rapid issue identification and resolution. As alerts are triggered within your environment, this dashboard will auto-populate and display the alerts in a variety of ways.
